tweets.content:
I have listed my September-maturity sUSDf YT @FalconStable on @pendle_fi for sale and switched to placing buy orders for January-maturity sUSDf YT

ğŸ”· My reasoning is as follows:

In the early stage, the ratio of accumulated points to the loss in YT asset value is significantly higher than it will be later. Over the next few days, as the September pool approaches maturity, the â€œend-of-life YT effectâ€ will gradually emerge, and the implied APY is expected to keep climbing. Shifting funds into a longer-dated pool at this point offers much better cost-effectiveness.

ğŸ”· Key reasons:
1. Based on prior stablecoin projects, Falcon may eventually impose specific requirements on sUSDf holdings. YT is a cost-efficient way to meet such requirements.
2. YT assets that deliver high yields in the first TGE season often spark market FOMO in the second season. For example, Etherfiâ€™s implied APY surged in S2, and Ethenaâ€™s Pendle pools in S2 launched with an astonishing implied APY above 300%.

This 16.6% is not an arbitrary comparison with yvbal.

Assume:
yvbal underlying rate = 3%
sUSDf underlying rate = 8.5%
yvbal points multiplier = 60x
sUSDf points multiplier = 36x

Since the current yvbal implied APY is 16.6%, we can take it as the pricing benchmark.

That means the sUSDf implied APY, based on yvbal pricing, should be:

(yvbal implied APY âˆ’ yvbal underlying APY) / 60 Ã— 30 + sUSDf underlying APY = 16.66%

How to Prepare Steadily for @FalconStable Season2

Falcon @pendle_fi has just launched a new sUSDf pool maturing in Jan 2026.

By combining it with the existing yvbal-gho-usdf pool (same Jan 2026 maturity), a balanced portfolio can be constructed.

âœ… Key Points:
Current implied APY for sUSDf (29 JAN): ~20%
Implied APY for yvbal pool: ~16.6%

Assuming the sUSDf underlying APY stays at 8.5%,
the new pool only becomes more attractive if its actual APY falls below 16.6%.

â‡ï¸ Strategy Setup:
Buy YT of the yvbal pool
Buy an equivalent amount of PT in the sUSDf pool

This approach locks in yield ranges while ensuring a stable maturity allocation across pools.
